item.title: IntellDebug
item.author: Author
item.description: Breakpoints Notation If a file with breakpoints was modified externally, for example, update through a VCS or changed in an external editor, and the line numbers have changed, the breakpoints will be moved accordingly. Types of breakpoints(Add breakpoints) Setting Line breakpoint keymap Line breakpoints Click the gutter at the executable line of code or press keymap Method breakpoints Click the gutter at the line where the method is declared, or press keymap
